name: habitica
description: Habitica is a gamified task manager based on role-playing game mechanics. Users complete real-life tasks to level up, earn rewards, and battle monsters. It supports both self-hosted setup and hosted service tiers.
features: Gamification: RPG-style task system, Level up characters, Earn rewards. Make productivity fun.
Habits: Daily habit tracking, Streak counting, Positive reinforcement. Build better routines.
Dailies: Recurring tasks, Flexible schedules, Completion tracking. Stay consistent.
To-Dos: One-time tasks, Priority levels, Due dates. Get things done.
Rewards: Custom rewards, In-game purchases, Motivation system. Treat yourself.
Social: Join parties, Guild quests, Challenge friends. Stay accountable together.
Pets & Mounts: Collect creatures, Hatch eggs, Feed pets. Build your collection.
Classes: Warrior, Mage, Rogue, Healer, Unique abilities. Choose your path.
Challenges: Community challenges, Custom goals, Compete with others. Push your limits.
Mobile Apps: iOS and Android, Sync across devices, Offline mode. Track anywhere.
